item.title: Applying convex optimazation to arbitrage in CFMM
Where will MEV in blockchain go?
About
item.description: Hi there! I am Tsiao Wang, welecome to my website where I share my thoughts, stories and occasionnally some technological posts. Currently I am prusuing my computer science master degree at the Peking University and sometimes I pretend to do some research at the blockchain research center. In the past few months I noted MEV issues in permissionless blockchain’s ecosystem. So I founded Pioplat which is an open-sourced business service focusing on latency reduction in current blockchain systems such like the Ethereum, the Binance smart chain, and the Polygon.
